# Base Terraform Executor

## `backendConfig`
- **Type**: `array`
- **Default**: `[]`

> Backend Config


The backend configuration


## `autoApproval`
- **Type**: `boolean`
- **Default**: `false`

> Auto Approval


Whether to auto-approve the plan


## `planFile`
- **Type**: `string`
- **Default**: `"plan.out"`

> Plan File


The plan file


## `formatWrite`
- **Type**: `boolean`
- **Default**: `false`

> Format Write


Whether to format the files before writing


## `upgrade`
- **Type**: `boolean`
- **Default**: `false`

> Upgrade


Whether to upgrade the modules


## `migrateState`
- **Type**: `boolean`
- **Default**: `false`

> Migrate State


Whether to migrate the state


## `lock`
- **Type**: `boolean`
- **Default**: `false`

> Lock


Whether to lock the state


## `varFile`
- **Type**: `string`
- **Default**: `"variables.tf"`

> Var File


The variable file


## `varString`
- **Type**: `string`

> Var String


The variable string


## `reconfigure`
- **Type**: `boolean`
- **Default**: `false`

> Reconfigure


Whether to reconfigure the state
